panels.description:
‚ö†Ô∏è BLOCKED: Input vs Output token breakdown per user requires vLLM changes.

Expected metrics:
- vllm:prompt_tokens_total{user="$user"} (input tokens)
- vllm:generation_tokens_total{user="$user"} (output tokens)

Note: Total token consumption per user IS available via authorized_hits{user="..."}.
This panel is specifically for the input/output breakdown needed for accurate billing.
panels.title: üî§ Input/Output Token Breakdown per User

panels.description:
‚ÑπÔ∏è Required changes to enable blocked features:

**Latency per User:**
- Add EnvoyFilter to extract 'user' from JWT/header
- Configure Istio Telemetry to include custom dimensions

**Token per User:**
- Modify llm-d/vLLM to accept X-User-ID header
- Label token metrics with user context

**Related Jira:** TBD - User story to be identified
